name: AskMissTeacher
0:
”Alexa, ask miss teacher what are some farm animals”
”Alexa, ask miss teacher what does the cow say”
”Alexa, ask miss teacher to count from two to twenty”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: miss teacher
des: You can ask Miss Teacher what common animals say, e.g. moo or woof. You can also ask Miss Teacher to list some farm, African, sea animals, farm animals, sharks, whales, dinosaurs, as well, and even list vehicles and construction vehicles. In addition, you can have Miss Teacher count from a number range as well, and list shapes!
